sections.description: Presents a summary of utilization metrics for Street - MH, Street - EVG, Terminal, and Grand Total, including percentages and utilization rates.
sections.notes: Includes utilization rates as a percentage of different categories.

sections.description: Details the key assumptions and calculations for revenue and cost drivers, including usage days, rates, and associated revenues for Trucker Street, EVG Street, and Terminal operations. Also includes annual inflation assumptions.
sections.notes: Incorporates annual inflation assumptions for various rates and costs.

sections.description: Summarizes the revenue generated and provides utilization metrics, including total revenue, EVG Street costs, Terminal billings, and average costs per usage day.
key_components: EVG Average Cost per EVG Usage Day
EVG Average Cost per EVG Street Day
EVG Terminal Cost per Terminal Day
sections.notes: Calculates average costs per usage day for different segments.

sections.description: Details the per-usage-day costs, including M&R, Admin, Repo, Other, and Lease costs, providing a breakdown of expenses associated with each usage day.
key_components: Lease Cost per Day on EVG Chassis
Lease Cost per Day on EVG Leases
Incremental Pool Overuse Cost per Day
sections.notes: Breaks down the costs associated with each usage day into various categories.

sections.description: Presents the operating expenses, including M&R, Admin, Repo, Other, Bad Debt, and Lease costs, providing a comprehensive view of the company's expenses.
key_components: Lease Cost on EVG Owned Chassis
Lease Cost on EVG Existing Leases
Gain Sharing with EVG on MH Conversion
sections.notes: Provides a detailed breakdown of operating expenses.

sections.description: Analyzes EBITDA, including EBITDA per usage day, EBITDA per chassis per day, and EBITDA margin, providing insights into the company's profitability.
sections.notes: Calculates EBITDA-related metrics to assess profitability.

sections.description: Details the costs associated with chassis acquisition, including price per chassis, reconditioning costs, decoupling costs, repositioning, retitling & stenciling costs, working capital investment, offhire costs, and scrap chassis value.
key_components: Less: Scrap Chassis at $1,000 per Chassis
sections.notes: Provides a comprehensive breakdown of chassis acquisition costs.

sections.section_name: Cash Flow Analysis - Depreciated Value Exit
sections.description: Analyzes the cash flows with a depreciated value exit strategy, including investment, accelerated depreciation, EBIT, cash taxes, cash income, WC investment, capex, and cash flow.
sections.notes: Calculates cash flows based on a depreciated value exit strategy.

sections.description: Analyzes the cash flows with a TEV (Total Enterprise Value) exit strategy, including investment, accelerated depreciation, EBIT, cash taxes, cash income, WC investment, capex, and cash flow.
sections.notes: Calculates cash flows based on a TEV exit strategy.
